detectors.description:
Zentachain.constructor() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Zentachain.sol#28-32) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- supply = 26500000 * 10 ** decimals (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Zentachain.sol#29)

detectors.description:
Zentachain.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Zentachain.sol#48-56) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- balances[from] -= tokens (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Zentachain.sol#52)
	- balances[to] += tokens (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Zentachain.sol#53)
	- allowed[from][to] -= tokens (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Zentachain.sol#54)

detectors.description:
totalSupply() should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Zentachain.sol#5)
	- Zentachain.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Zentachain.sol#58-60)

balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Zentachain.sol#6)
	- Zentachain.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Zentachain.sol#62-64)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- Zentachain.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Zentachain.sol#66-72)
	- ERC20Interface.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Zentachain.sol#7)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- Zentachain.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Zentachain.sol#34-36)
	- ERC20Interface.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Zentachain.sol#8)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Zentachain.sol#9)
	- Zentachain.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Zentachain.sol#38-45)
